definition: You're really quite something!/You're just amazing!
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to have real skill/to know one's stuff
to laugh heartily/to burst into loud laughter
(affectionate form of address for a male who is not very much younger than oneself) my boy/old pal
elder brother (often used self-referentially)/(form of address between male friends) old chap/buddy
to deride/to mock/(jocularly) to heckle good-naturedly/to razz
to laugh in spite of oneself/to be unable to help laughing/to break into laughter
brows raised in delight, eyes laughing (idiom); beaming with joy/all smiles
(literary) youngster/(old) young fellow (term of address used by the older generation)/(old) I, me (used in speaking to one's elders)
